title: Windows 11 Introduces AI Copilot to Revolutionize Your Workflow
description: In the perpetually shifting terrain of technological advancements, Windows 11 has once again assumed a pivotal role, seizing the spotlight with its most recent update, aptly named Moment 4. Amidst the myriad enhancements seamlessly integrated into this technological tapestry, the revelation of Microsoft AI Copilot emerges as a veritable tour de force, constituting a groundbreaking ... title: $524,700,000,000 Added To US Debt in 21 Days As Senator Warns ‘Death Spiral’ Could Bury Future Generations
description:
The US government is piling debt onto its balance sheet, adding more than half a trillion dollars in debt in just three weeks. New numbers from the government’s FiscalData platform show the country’s debt surged from $32.9886 trillion on September 14th to $33.5133 trillion on October 5th – representing a $524.7 billion increase. Amid the […]

The post $524,700,000,000 Added To US Debt in 21 Days As Senator Warns ‘Death Spiral’ Could Bury Future Generations appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
